TITLE: Alexander, the Shield
ABILITY1: Whenever `X` damage is assigned to another allied character, reinforce this character for `X-1`.
ABILITY2: Reassign up to 3 damage from a single allied character to this character.

TITLE: Amy, the Eye
ABILITY1: Your opponent chooses one seeded fateline to reveal. If `X` crystal charge was paid as an activation cost, you may activate the revealed fate as if it were your own at stack level `X-1`.

TITLE: Audrey, the Siren
ABILITY1: When you are not the initiator, you may pay 1 crystal charge to trigger a single fateline at the start of the Action phase.

TITLE: Caius, the Heart
ABILITY1: Target opponent gains maximum crystal charge when you Summon this character. When this opponent has 0 crystal charges, realize this character's destiny.

TITLE: Cheryl, the Thief
ABILITY1: Steal 1 reinforcement from an opponent's character. You may also use 1 crystal charge to assign 1 damage to that target.

TITLE: Zeta, the Chaos
ABILITY1: This character is summoned with 3 reinforcement.
ABILITY3:
Whenever a fateline is triggered, if this character is:
- Unbroken, assign 1 damage.
- Broken, reinforce 1.

TITLE: Wilt, the Usurper
ABILITY1: Whenever triggering unbreak on this character, remove all damage assignment from a target opponent character. Gain that many crystal charges.

TITLE: Sidney, the Merchant
ABILITY1: This character cannot be targeted by damage damage assignment directly from dice.
ABILITY2: Swap this character's reinforcement with another allied character's reinforcement.

TITLE: Samantha, the Virtuoso
ABILITY1: Assign `X` damage where `X` is the total reinforcement of this character.

TITLE: Ren, the Enigma
ABILITY1: When the opponent channels `X`, you may reinforce X or assign `X-1` damage.

TITLE: Natalie, the Gambler
ABILITY1: After the Roll phase when you are the initiator, you may reroll one die.

TITLE: Lucille, the Light
ABILITY1: When you Summon a character, reinforce that character for 1.
ABILITY2: When all of your characters have at least 1 reinforcement each, realize this card's destiny.

TITLE: Leslie, the Mark
ABILITY1: Choose one of an opponent's non-reinforced characters to mark.
ABILITY2: When a character marked by Leslie uses an ability, the mark is consumed and you gain 1 crystal charge

TITLE: Jennifer, the Pulse
ABILITY1: Once per turn when an ability you activate deals damage, you may stack a fate.
ABILITY2: Once per turn when you stack a fate, gain 1 crystal charge.

TITLE: Genevieve, the Scholar
ABILITY1: When playing crystallized fates, you may use `X` additional crystal charges to increase the stack level by `X-1`.

TITLE: Fortuna, the Lucky
ABILITY1: Break 2 target characters. Any rerolled dice cannot be used for this cost.

TITLE: Christina, the Prodigy
ABILITY1: Assign `X` damage, where `X` is the number of fates in your opponent's fate area.
ABILITY2: Reinforce `X`, where `X` is the number of fates in your opponent's fate area.
